content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to up-to-date information or announcements made after my last training. However, here are some examples of virtual events hosted by The Combination during the pandemic that were publicly available:

1. Virtual Wine Tasting
2. Virtual Yoga and Meditation Classes
3. Virtual Cooking Classes
4. Virtual Book Club Discussions
5. Virtual Concerts and Live Music Performances
6. Virtual Art Exhibitions and Tours
7. Virtual Networking and Business Events
8. Virtual Workshops and Training Sessions
